languages.text: "Это тревожные известия... и весьма не вовремя. Я получаю отрывочные сведения с мостика корабля — там замечен Кунрад Войгтвир, и даже скупые рапорты о его действиях воскрешают в моей памяти описания того, как выглядят ведьмовские ритуалы... если предатель Кунрад взялся за колдовство — нужно немедленно помешать ему".

"This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."
languages.original_text: "Это тревожные известия... и весьма не вовремя. Я получаю отрывочные сведения с мостика корабля — там замечен Кунрад Войгтвир, и даже скупые рапорты о его действиях воскрешают в моей памяти описания того, как выглядят ведьмовские ритуалы... если предатель Кунрад взялся за колдовство — нужно немедленно помешать ему".

I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

languages.text: “这很令人不安……而且这个时机太古怪了。我依然在收到来自舰桥的零星报告，说昆拉德·维特威尔出现在了那个地方。而且，我还收到了关于他的活动的少量情报，他的举动我不禁联想到了某种巫术仪式……如果那个叛徒真的打算利用巫术的力量，那我们必须立刻阻止他。”
languages.original_text: "This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

traits.locale_text: “这很令人不安……而且这个时机太古怪了。我依然在收到来自舰桥的零星报告，说昆拉德·维特威尔出现在了那个地方。而且，我还收到了关于他的活动的少量情报，他的举动我不禁联想到了某种巫术仪式……如果那个叛徒真的打算利用巫术的力量，那我们必须立刻阻止他。”

languages.text: «Es preocupante... y no podía haber un momento más inoportuno para esto. Aún sigo recibiendo informes fragmentados desde el puente. Se ha avistado a Kunrad Voigtvir allí, y los escasos detalles que tengo sobre sus actividades me recuerdan a las descripciones de rituales de hechicería... Si ese traidor ha recurrido a la brujería, debemos detenerlo de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

traits.locale_text: «Es preocupante... y no podía haber un momento más inoportuno para esto. Aún sigo recibiendo informes fragmentados desde el puente. Se ha avistado a Kunrad Voigtvir allí, y los escasos detalles que tengo sobre sus actividades me recuerdan a las descripciones de rituales de hechicería... Si ese traidor ha recurrido a la brujería, debemos detenerlo de inmediato».

languages.text: 「これは厄介だ…その上タイミングが悪い。私はまだブリッジからの断片的な報告しか受けていない。クンラッド・ボイトヴィルをそこで見かけた者がいるそうだ。そして私の手元にある、あいつの活動に関するわずかな情報でさえ、魔術の儀式に関する記述を思い起こさせる…もしあの裏切り者が魔術を使うというなら、我々はすぐに彼を止めなければならない」
languages.original_text: "This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

traits.locale_text: 「これは厄介だ…その上タイミングが悪い。私はまだ橋からの断片的な報告を受けている。クンラッド・ボイトヴィルをそこで見かけた者がいる。そして私の手元にある、あいつの活動に関するわずかな情報でさえ、魔術の儀式の説明を思い出させる…もし あの裏切り者が魔術を使うというなら、我々はすぐに彼を止めなければならない」
「これは厄介だ…その上タイミングが悪い。私はまだブリッジからの断片的な報告しか受けていない。クンラッド・ボイトヴィルをそこで見かけた者がいるそうだ。そして私の手元にある、あいつの活動に関するわずかな情報でさえ、魔術の儀式に関する記述を思い起こさせる…もしあの裏切り者が魔術を使うというなら、我々はすぐに彼を止めなければならない」

languages.text: « C'est troublant... et le moment est vraiment mal choisi. Je continue à recevoir des rapports partiels de la passerelle. Kunrad Voigtvir y a été repéré, et les quelques renseignements que j'ai pu obtenir sur ses activités me font penser à des rituels de sorcellerie... Si ce traître a recours aux pratiques occultes, nous devons l'arrêter sans plus attendre. »
languages.original_text: "This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

traits.locale_text: « C'est troublant... et le moment est vraiment mal choisi. Je continue à recevoir des rapports partiels de la passerelle. Kunrad Voigtvir y a été repéré, et les quelques renseignements que j'ai pu obtenir sur ses activités me font penser à des rituels de sorcellerie... Si ce traître a recours aux pratiques occultes, nous devons l'arrêter sans plus attendre. »

languages.text: "Das ist beunruhigend ... und kommt zu einem schlechten Zeitpunkt. Ich empfange immer noch bruchstückhaft Berichte von der Brücke – Kunrad Voigtvir wurde dort gesichtet, und die wenigen Informationen über seine Aktivitäten erinnern mich an Beschreibungen von Hexenritualen ... Falls dieser Verräter sich der Hexerei verschrieben hat, müssen wir ihn sofort aufhalten."
languages.original_text: "This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."

Falls dieser Verräter sich der Hexerei verschrieben hat, müssen wir ihn sofort aufhalten."

languages.text: "Hayra alamet değil, zamanlaması da yersiz. Hâlâ köprüden bölük pörçük de olsa rapor alabiliyorum. Kunrad Voigtvir'i görmüşler. Eylemlerine dair edindiğim şuncacık istihbarat bile aklıma sahirlik ayinlerini getiriyor. O hain, cadılığa başvurduysa kendisini derhâl durdurmamız şart."
languages.original_text: "This is troubling... and the timing is inopportune. I am still receiving fragmentary reports from the bridge — Kunrad Voigtvir was spotted there, and even what scant intelligence on his activities I have reminds me of descriptions of sorcerous rituals... If that traitor has resorted to witchcraft, we must stop him at once."
